document_data.name: Immolus
document_data.mainbody: '''Archon Immolus''' was a [[fire archon]] of [[Mount Hotenow]] and a member of the [[cult of Maegera]] led by the [[fire giant]] [[Gommoth]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. Immolus commanded a group of lesser fire archons.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, Immolus and the [[fire giant]] [[Grumthrox]] captured [[Firecross Bridge]] to isolate the [[dwarves]] of the [[Clan Hillborn|Hillborn]] expedition from their allies on Mount Hotenow.{{Cite web/Neverwinter Developer Blog/CTA: Battle for the Bridge}}

The pair were defeated by the [[Heroes of the Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] that same year, and the bridge was reclaimed by the adventurers and the Hillborn expedition.
